Egypt court orders parliament dissolved

Judges dissolved the Islamist-dominated parliament today and ruled that Hosni Mubarak's former prime minister can run in the presidential runoff. (AP, 2:01 p.m.)
  • 6/6: Mubarak's health deteriorates amid crisis
  • 5/28: Violence flares after Egypt election results
Battleground: Obama and Romney in Ohio

Obama: Election a chance to break political stalemate

In a speech in Ohio today, President Obama said November's election will give voters two different visions for the country. (AP, 3:10 p.m.)

Romney: Obama 'long on words,' 'short on action'

Speaking in Ohio today, Mitt Romney assailed President Obama, saying the Democrat was "short on action" when it comes to the economy. (AP, 2:51 p.m.)
  • Romney hits Obama for 'doing fine' remark in new ad
  • Pictures Election 2012 ads | On the campaign trail
